question: what is talal altahan?
answer: With Fellowship from McMaster University, Bachelor of Medicine from King Saud University, Talal Altahan has 2 yrs of experience as a Associate Executive Director for Medical Affairs at Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Hospital in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 5 yrs 4 mos of experience as a Head of General Surgery department at Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Hospital in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 8 yrs 7 mos of experience as a General / Trauma Surgeon at Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Hospital in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 1 yr 4 mos of experience as a Chairman of Surgical Departments at Prince Mohammed bin Abdulaziz Hospital in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 3 yrs 6 mos of experience as a Trauma Service Line Lead at Riyadh Second Health Cluster in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 6 yrs 3 mos of experience as a General Surgery Resident at King Abdulaziz Medical City in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and is proficient in Surgery, General Surgery, Hospitals, Leadership.
